author: Beiyi SEOW
title: Small Parcels In Limbo As Trump Moves To End US Tariff Exemption
description: An approaching US deadline to end tariff exemptions on small parcels has tripped up global deliveries to the world's biggest economy, with businesses halting shipments to American consumers and mulling price hikes.
